javadoc:
Class with a convenience method to get an array of the CodeUnit
 comment types. The method is useful to loop through the comment types
 once you have a code unit.

methods.javadoc: Get an array containing the comment types on a code unit.
methods.name: getTypes
methods.comment: Get an array containing the comment types on a code unit.

name: CommentTypes
comment:
Class with a convenience method to get an array of the CodeUnit
 comment types. The method is useful to loop through the comment types
 once you have a code unit.
